net.hudup.core.alg

Class CompositeRecommender

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.hudup.core.alg.AbstractAlg
      • net.hudup.core.alg.Recommender
        • net.hudup.core.alg.CompositeRecommender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Alg, CompositeAlg
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BnetCombinatorCF, ExternalServerRecommender, RecommendContextPrefilter

    @Composite
public abstract class CompositeRecommender
extends Recommender
implements CompositeAlg
    Recommendation strategy is defined as the co-ordination of recommendation algorithms such as collaborative filtering and content-based filtering in accordance with coherent process so as to achieve the best result of recommendation. In simplest form, strategy is identified with a recommendation algorithm. Recommender service is the most complex service because it implements both algorithms and strategies and applies these strategies in accordance with concrete situation. CompositeRecommender represents the recommendation strategy, called composite recommender. CompositeRecommender is combination of other Recommender algorithms in order to produce the best list of recommended items. So CompositeRecommender stores a list of internal recommender (s) in its configuration returned from AbstractAlg.getConfig() method.
    Version:
    10.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setInnerRecommenders

        protected void setInnerRecommenders(AlgList recommenders)
        CompositeRecommender stores a list of internal recommender (s) in its configuration returned from AbstractAlg.getConfig() method. This method sets such recommender list into the configuration of CompositeRecommender.
        Parameters:
        recommenders - specified list of recommender (s).

      • getInnerRecommenders

        public AlgList getInnerRecommenders()
        CompositeRecommender stores a list of internal recommender (s) in its configuration returned from AbstractAlg.getConfig() method. This method gets such recommender list from the configuration.
        Returns:
        list of inner recommender (s).
